events.message: I recently received my order but I want to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations and I am not satisfied.
The customer's message contains keywords related to refund so the case has been categorized under the Refund cluster for appropriate handling.
Assigning this refund request case to the Returns Department agent for prompt resolution.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund quickly, please confirm the order ID and reason for the refund including any relevant details.
My order number is 987654321. I want a refund because the item arrived damaged and does not work as advertised.
Thank you for the details. We can offer a full refund upon receiving the returned item. I will send you the prepaid return label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the solution and will send back the product using the label you provide.
We have received your returned package and processed the full refund. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to appear in your account.
Just checking in to ensure that your refund has been received and if you need any further assistance from our side.
As you have confirmed the refund was received and there are no further issues, we will close the case now. Thank you for contacting support.
